name: DISPLACED (itch) (Evelyn Schwab)
description:
DISPLACED is a 3D platformer about a lost frog seeking a new home

DISPLACED is a 3rd person Unreal Engine developed game with a deep movement system that gives the player access to a wide variety of movements and actions to be used in interesting ways, and takes on an expressive, stylized visual identity inspired by Studio Ghibli's works and games such as The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

In DISPLACED, you play as a tiny frog lost in an unfamiliar environment. On a search for a new home and frog-friendly habitat, he must come up with creative methods to surmount physical obstacles. The frog will meet several animal and insect characters along the way, some in need of or offering help, and some who hinder the frog.

DISPLACED is on indefinite hold since December 2022, and currently exists as a 1--15 minute vertical slice/demo.
